text: I realised this is not necessarily true.The SMS whether it mentioned "if you have previously registered" appears intermittently. Just take it as a gentle reminder without it necessarily meaning anything.I know because my humans who were all 'brand new' to the cycle  some got this phrase some didn't.The most reliable is always to use your own Excel to record your participation month details.
I registered once only in apr2023 last month
if you want confirmation  best is contact your RM. He/She can see your participation cycle.
Then all good for the bonus interest in Apr to Jul cycle.

Hi. I saw on the UOB One Card Exclusions list that Transit link is one of the items. Does it mean that we cant get the One Account bonus interest for our bus/mrt rides ?

TRANSIT* refers to topup on CEPAS cards.If you use SimplyGo (tap the One Card or Apple/Google/Samsung Pay etc)  it's coded as BUS/MRT*  counted.This qn has been asked and answered a lot of times afaik.
one more reason - is it possible your transaction is $50 but net payment charge to card is less than $50 due to deduct using mile ?
haha i m not too sure either. the CSO has replied to my email  so i will just provide proof etc  and see what they say. they are quite fast in replying to emails  maybe it is an easy qn... lol
Anyone knows if annual fee can be waived for Citi premier miles card although not much spending will be made (<50 per month). Thinking of applying for the priority pass ðŸ˜¬
Will there be fall below fee in June in your example?

If premier ega account  no fall below fee. For personal banking ega account by right have fall below fee but by left the bank may not charge it. Even if charged $5 fall below fee  the interest earned for $2k savings across 3-4 months will be more than $5.

Hi. Usually what would be a default credit card 1 should have?1) Transport card2) Dining card3) ?

Answered to death alrd. Depends on how much your spendingIf no min spend and low spender  jitao get HSBC revo for dining and retail spend and travel and private transport (eg.grab) and groceries up to 1k per month for 4MPD or 2.5% cashback. SCB smart for public transportIf got 600$ per month  look at DBS live fresh/UOB EVOL for slightly higher cashbackDonâ€™t ask insurance/tax payment pls  b4 u search this chat

Hi Gurus  Can anyone advise me if DBS points earned from multiple credit cards are pooled and combined together  or is it kept separate like if you were to own 2 citibank cards?
SC and Trust are 2 separate entities and 2 different banks. If really unsure  check the T&Cs for any new signup promo.
